system.description:
At 7th level, you gain one of the following features:

Trained Eyes. You gain darkvision out to a range of 30 feet, or if you already have it, the range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet.

Additionally, you gain an expertise die to perceive, detect and locate traps.

Trained Feet. Moving through nonmagical difficult terrain and magical difficult terrain that you have created costs you no extra movement.

Trained Mind. You gain proficiency with your choice of either Arcana, Culture, History, or Religion. If you are already proficient in the chosen skill, you instead gain an expertise die.
